data.title: Azmont Investments and Pizzarotti signed the contract
data.meta_description: Azmont Investments and Impresa Pizzarotti & CSPA signed a contract worth 305 million euros for the management of construction works. Italian contractor ...
data.text:
Azmont Investments and Impresa Pizzarotti & C.SPA signed a contract worth 305 million euros for the management of construction works.

The Italian construction contractor will join Portonovi resort as the main contractor of the emerging project, which, as announced by Azmont Investments, will position Montenegro on the map of high-end catering.

"When we announced the tender for the main contractor, a number of well-known global companies came forward to participate and offered their expertise. After a transparent and long tender process, as an investor we made a decision on the best in this field for us. Impresa Pizzarotti has extensive international experience in building high-luxury residences, hotels and multi-functional projects around the world. The next three years, especially 2016 and 2017, will be characterized by a large number of construction activities. This period will be an excellent opportunity for local construction and service companies as well for cooperation with Pizzarotti and gaining experience," said the chairman of the board of directors of Azmont Investments, Ahmet Erentok.

The President of the Board of Directors of Pizzarotti Paolo Pizzarotti said that Frin a very relevant project for their company and strategic activity.

"Once again we confirm what we said during the signing of the contract itself. We are proud to have been chosen as the main contractor for this unique project, one of the most prestigious in the Mediterranean. We will transfer our knowledge and experience when it comes to construction management, quality and work organization , to make the project successful," said Pizzarotti.

Azmont Investment stated that the work on the marina is progressing, that 8 percent of piling has already been completed, and that 81 percent of the earthwork has been done.

"The concrete construction for the first four buildings in the 'Lower Village' section has also been completed," the announcement concludes.
